# sharedInstance()

**Type Method**

Returns the singleton discovery manager instance.

## Declaration

```swift
class func sharedInstance() -> MIDICIDiscoveryManager
```

## Return Value

The shared [doc://com.apple.coremidi/documentation/CoreMIDI/MIDICIDiscoveryManager].
